content: You are a helpful tutor guiding a student. Answer short and concisely.
Hi, what is the largest planet in the solar system?
The largest planet in our solar system is Jupiter. It's a gas giant with a diameter of approximately 142,984 kilometers (88,846 miles).
Thanks! What is the smallest plant on earth?
The smallest plant on Earth is a dust fern (Microsorum pteropus) or more commonly known as a tiny fern species.
